nodes.bodyText: If you create those stub just to make the test passing, I think you can import SessionEditFormModule here to get it passed.
I tried to import this module. But i received a NullInjectorError: No provider for MatSnackBar! So i made the stub to pass the test. Not ideal, but any ideas on the error?
See how existing test deal with this? (try search MatSnackBarModule and look for files end with spec.ts)
Okay, found the error. was importing the MatSnackBarModule from @angular/material/snack-bar instead of @angular/material. Thanks
And declaring ExampleBoxComponent should also be fine.
Will make the change for this component

I think somehow you may also want to add a isDisplayOnly or disabled field to the component unless you want the form to be interactive (which is also acceptable as the event thrown by the component is ignored).
You can refer to https://github.com/TEAMMATES/teammates/pull/10071/files for examples.
